# GETTING THE MOST OUT OF THE LYRAE
- Customise your labs! The second lab is incomplete but is designed to be customisable for either an anomaly vessel or a second artifact analyser. - Make use of the gas transfer systems in the labs to capture any valuable gases produced by artifacts. - The existing lattice and free space between the Lyrae's 'arms' are ideal space for storing artifacts or for expanding the ship itself. - Consider hiring a salvager to work with you for all your artifact and material needs! - The workshop has plenty of space for you to add new machines. - Remember to increase the power output of the generator as you install more machines!
